snippet: Employers created the most jobs in five months, while consumers spent a little more at stores after three months of declines.
abstract: Stocks are mostly higher amid signs that the nation's economic recovery is advancing, albeit slowly.
lead_paragraph: Employers created the most jobs in five months, while consumers spent a little more at stores after three months of declines.

headline.seo: Nasdaq Rises on a Day of Light Trading
